name: EGAIM
description:
Short, low poly, first-person, atmospheric, experimental game.

In this short psx-esque experience you have only one chance to succeed.

Controls:
WSAD - move
Mouse - look around
E/LMB - interact
Alt+F4 - close

You can find soundtrack here: https://soundcloud.com/thatfoxlovesme/sets/egaim-soundtrack
